creator.name: สราวุธ ครองสัตย์

description:
{"blocks":[{"key":"88tql","text":"Objectives: To investigate the performance of serial Alberta Stroke Program Early CT Score (ASPECTS)
assessment for predicting stroke-associated pneumonia (SAP) in patients with thrombolyzed
acute anterior circulation ischemic stroke (AACIS).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"euu18","text":"Materials and Methods: A retrospective
observational cohort study of adult patients with thrombolyzed AACIS was
conducted. Baseline and 24-hour ASPECTS using non-contrast computed tomography (NCCT), complications of stroke, including SAP and swallowing dysfunction
using the Modified Water Swallowing test, were collected. Receiver operating
characteristic curves using binary logistic regression and a multivariable
logistic regression model were generated to compare the predictive performance.
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"2tsnn","text":"The authors have no conflicts of interest directly relevant to the content of this article.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
ethics_statement: {"blocks":[{"key":"1cdi2","text":"The research obtained ethical authorization from the human research ethics committee at Saraburi Hospital on May 2, 2023, with Certificate No. EC017/2566.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: Medical Education Center at Saraburi Hospital

keywords: ischemic stroke, cerebrovascular disease, thrombolysis, ASPECTS, stroke-associated pneumonia
